item.title: OkHttp 3.X on Android 4.4.4
item.description: This morning I was greeted at work by an unexpectedly-large number of crashes from a new Android release. As it happens, OkHttp 3.X has issues on Android 4.4.4 and 4.4.2 - it cannot reliably load the system’s default TrustManagers without looping and eventually crashing with an OutOfMemoryError.
